good.title: First Christmas on our new home
good.body: Since we are so far ahead of schedule for developing our new world, we had the resources to grow a real Christmas Tree in the hyrdoponic farm. Double rations are to be served for dinner. The crew are in great spirits for the days ahead!

neutral.title: First Christmas on a new world

bad.title: First Christmas far from home
bad.body: With the death of {ASTRONAUT} still fresh in memory, the first Christmas on {PLANET} is a solemn occasion, and some astronauts are harboring doubts that they’ll be alive to celebrate the next one.
bad.dismiss: Until then, we’ll have to muddle through somehow.
